title: chest!
body: So i have now waited maybe 1 month to get a chest i get s so many times and my teamates gets s so many times but i never gets a chest but my firends get chest. I have 3 chest avialable but i never get one i mean what is this? when i bought a key it seems like riot never wants to give me chest after i got my key. I mean its not even fair when i have to wait 1 month and never got any chest and my friend got like 3 chest in a row so i mean is there any bugs or smth*?

replies.body:
There are a few things we should probably clear up here. First, you'll only get a chest for a teammates' S-grade if they are in your premade group. If they were just some random person you were paired with through matchmaking, their S-grade will not grant you a chest. Additionally, you'll need to ensure you're playing a large pool of champs if you want to earn a lot of chests. This is because you can only earn one chest on each champion per season, and premade teammates' S-grades that grant you a chest will count towards the single chest you can earn for that champ.

Check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for additional details on how the system works. Let me know if you have any questions.
